doc:
Lee Frederick https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lee_Frederick 0 Lee Frederick (June 2, 1912 – June 6, 1993) also credited as Robert Peyton) was an American film actor active during the 1950s. He played the lead character of an intelligence officer in the 1951 espionage thriller Tokyo File 212 opposite Florence Marly. Critic Robert J. Lentz called his performance "solid". Lee_Frederick ( June_2_,_1912 – June_6_,_1993 ) also credited as Robert_Peyton ) was an_American_film_actor active during the_1950s . He played the_lead_character of an_intelligence_officer in the_1951_espionage_thriller_Tokyo_File_212_opposite_Florence_Marly . Critic_Robert_J._Lentz called his_performance_"_solid_" .
